prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies the power of nature with striking green and black colors.
Imagine a unique creature that blends dragon and canine features, showcasing vibrant shades of green.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with a sleek design, featuring vivid green accents and powerful limbs.
Design a mythical Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains, adorned with elements of nature.
Show me a creature with both dark and bright colors, possessing a commanding presence and agility.
Give me a Pokemon that can camouflage in grasslands with a mix of earthy tones and striking green.
Make a Pokemon that's fierce and protective, with a muscular build and a blend of black and green hues.

distinctive_features: Facial structure reminiscent of a wolf
